name: Mujib Borsho Countdown
author: SynthiaSoft

sections.description:
100 Years of Mujib| Learn about the legendary life and philosophy of Bangabandhu, Sheikh Mujibur Rahman. The countdown to Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman’s birth centenary celebrations has begun after re-enactment of his homecoming.
To respect this event we launching this plugin free of cost so that everyone from all over the world can use this plugin in their website and show respect by showing the countdown in their website. This is a completely free plugin just click below given link to download the plugin and also you may follow the given steps to install tine plugin in your website.

If this any modification require and if you face any problem please Inform us via email.

support@synthiasoft.com

2.0.2

  • All Bug Fixed

1.0.0

  • This is the First Version.
sections.installation:
Mujib Borsho Plugin Installation Process
Step 1.

Download the Plugin from WordPress official Website.

Step 2.

Upload it in you wp-content/plugins directory.

Step 3.

Activate it from Admin panel.

Now you can display Mujib Borsho Countdown any widget area of your Theme.

You can also use Short-code [ mujib_countdown ] . (remove all space into [ ] to use short code.)
sections.faq:
Can I add more style?

Ans: Yeas But you need manually edit.
